alert.note: Alert for Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 31 at 3:12PM CDT until April 01 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CDT SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow and mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Wadena County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
